name: drinky
desc: Drinks search web app consuming The Cocktail DB, Features: Filter search, drink mix recipe, useContext & Material-UI, CSS-animations.

name: free img
desc: Image search gallery consuming pixabay API, Features: live search, full image view, download image, stats view and pagination.

name: foody
desc: Web app to order fast food, kinda digital food menu. Features: final order receipt, multiple option menu, data order, dinamic price.

name: schedule
desc: Web app to save reminders and digital notes. Features: glassmorphism design, local storage, form validation.
